ItemTooltip.PanicNecklace:
Grants the [c/a2badb:{$BuffName.Panic} buff] for [c/a2badb:8 seconds] after [c/ffff22:receiving damage]
The {$BuffName.Panic} buff grants [c/a2badb:+100% movement speed]
ItemTooltip.HoneyComb:
Release [c/ffff22:1-3 homing, damaging bees] after [c/ffff22:receiving damage]
The [c/ffff22:Hive Pack] allows for [c/ffff22:1-4] bees to spawn
Grants the [c/96ffa8:{$BuffName.Honey} buff] for [c/96ffa8:5 seconds] after [c/ffff22:receiving damage]
The {$BuffName.Honey} buff grants [c/96ffa8:+1 HP per second], [c/96ffa8:triples natural healing rate], and [c/96ffa8:reduces] [c/ffff22:damage over time debuffs] by [c/96ffa8:2 HP per second]
